movies.title: The Last Days
movies.Plot: In late 1944, even as they faced imminent defeat, the Nazis expended enormous resources to kill or deport over 425,000 Jews during the "cleansing" of Hungary. This Oscar-winning documentary, executive produced by Steven Spielberg,...

movies.title: Brother Outsider: The Life of Bayard Rustin
movies.Plot: Documentary on Bayard Rustin, best-remembered as the organizer of the 1963 March on Washington.

movies.title: The Battered Bastards of Baseball
movies.Plot: In 1973, Hollywood actor Bing Russell starts an independent minor league baseball team in Portland consisting of outcasts and misfits, and turns them into unlikely overnight success.

movies.title: Five Came Back
movies.Plot: The wartime contributions of five prominent Hollywood film directors during World War II are profiled.

movies.title: Wormwood
movies.Plot: In 1953, Army scientist Frank Olson takes a fatal plunge from a hotel window. In 1975, a bombshell report ties his death to a top-secret experiment.

movies.title: Captive
movies.Plot: Documentary series that depicts hostage negotiations, the stories are told by the victims themselves.

movies.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
movies.Plot: Historian Dan Jones explores the millennium of history behind six of Great Britain's most famous castles: Warwick, Dover, Caernarfon, the Tower of London, Carrickfergus, and Stirling.

movies.title: Roman Empire
movies.Plot: Chronicles some of the most famous leaders of the Roman Civilization.

movies.title: Hitler - A Career
movies.Plot: This meticulously assembled film dissects the Third Reich with an analytical blade, charting Hitler's improbable rise, his mastery of crowd psychology and his consummate skill in exploiting others' weaknesses.

movies.title: Struggle: The Life and Lost Art of Szukalski
movies.Plot: This documentary chronicles the life of Polish-American artist Stanislav Szukalski (1893-1987) from his early years in Chicago, to his time in Poland and Los Angeles, and his artistic and political contributions to the world.

movies.title: Hitler's Circle of Evil
movies.Plot: This is the story of the rise and fall of the Third Reich told like the drama it really was: through the personal relationships of the movers and shakers of the Nazi Party.

movies.title: The Confession Tapes
movies.Plot: A critical look into some true crime cases where American law enforcement made up for lack of actual physical evidence by using devious psychological tactics during interrogation in order to extract confessions from naive suspects.

movies.title: Medal of Honor
movies.Plot: A hybrid docu/live-action anthology series that portrays stories of personal sacrifice that resulted in the highest military distinction: the Medal of Honor.

movies.title: Bobby Kennedy for President
movies.Plot: This four-part documentary series weaves together rare and exclusive footage of attorney general, U.S. senator, and presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy in the 1960s.

movies.title: ReMastered: Devil at the Crossroads
movies.Plot: A look at the short, mysterious life of blues legend, Robert Johnson, who was said to have made a deal with the Devil at a crossroads in rural Mississippi.

movies.title: ReMastered: Tricky Dick & The Man in Black
Nisman: The Prosecutor, the President, and the Spy
Trial By Media
movies.Plot: In our modern media landscape where real courtroom dramas have increasingly been transformed into a form of entertainment, this series reflects on some of the most dramatic and memorable trials in recent history.

movies.title: The Last Czars
movies.Plot: A Chronicled look at the fall of the Romanov dynasty in Russia.

movies.title: Who Killed Malcolm X?
movies.Plot: Activist Abdur-Rahman Muhammad begins his own investigation into the perplexing details surrounding the assassination of civil rights leader Malcolm X.

movies.title: Amend: The Fight for America
movies.Plot: Will Smith hosts this look at the evolving, often lethal, fight for equal rights in America through the lens of the US Constitution's 14th Amendment.

movies.title: A Life of Speed: The Juan Manuel Fangio Story
movies.Plot: The life of five-time Formula One world champion Juan Manuel Fangio. The first official documentary.

movies.title: Age of Samurai: Battle for Japan
movies.Plot: An exploration of the warring kingdoms of feudal Japan when several powerful warlords fought to become absolute ruler.

movies.title: Empire Games
movies.Plot: This series explores the greatest empires in a way that has never been fully investigated. Each episode highlights and exposes the political intrigue, personal vendettas, family mayhem, acts of vengeance and the ever-evolving tens...

movies.title: Patria
movies.Plot: Paco Ignacio Taibo II brings his book trilogy to life, highlighting Mexico's history in 1854-1867, a period he considers foundational to the country.

movies.title: Greatest Events of WWII in Colour
movies.Plot: A series of colorized archive footage of important events during World War II.

movies.title: Rise of Empires: Ottoman
movies.Plot: Ottoman Sultan Mehmed II wages an epic campaign to take the Byzantine capital of Constantinople and shapes the course of history for centuries.

movies.title: Examination of Conscience
movies.Plot: Through interviews with victims, members of the clergy, journalists and experts, this series looks at the accusations of child abuse against catholic institutions in Spain.

movies.title: Ladies First: A Story of Women in Hip-Hop
movies.Plot: Recreates the role that the unstoppable women of hip-hop have played across the 50 years of this groundbreaking genre, putting them where they belong: at the heart of the present day.

movies.title: BREAK IT ALL: The History of Rock in Latin America
movies.Plot: Soda Stereo, Café Tacvba, Aterciopelados and others feature in this 50-year history of Latin American rock through dictatorships, disasters and dissent.

movies.title: SanPa: Sins of the Savior
movies.Plot: Amidst a heroin crisis, Vincenzo Muccioli cared for the addicted, earning him fierce public devotion -- even as charges of violence began to mount.

movies.title: Challenger
movies.Plot: When a race track owner loses his business due to the world wide pandemic, only one thing can save him from his despair - Based on true events.

movies.title: Untold: The Rise and Fall of AND1
movies.Plot: Inspired by New York City streetball, influential brand AND1 turned local legends on the court into international icons. So why did it come to an end?

movies.title: Untold: Operation Flagrant Foul
movies.Plot: Years after serving time for betting on games he officiated, former NBA referee Tim Donaghy revisits the scandal that shook up the league.

movies.title: Blood Brothers: Malcolm X & Muhammad Ali
movies.Plot: From a chance meeting to a tragic fallout, Malcolm X and Muhammad Ali's extraordinary bond cracks under the weight of distrust and shifting ideals.

movies.title: This Is a Robbery: The World's Biggest Art Heist
High on the Hog: How African American Cuisine Transformed America
movies.Plot: Black food is American food. Chef and writer Stephen Satterfield traces the delicious, moving throughlines from Africa to Texas in this docuseries.

movies.title: The Lost Pirate Kingdom
movies.Plot: The real-life pirates of the Caribbean violently plunder, stealing and form a surprisingly egalitarian republic in this documentary series.

movies.title: Dig Deeper: The Disappearance of Birgit Meier
Pelé
movies.Plot: The interaction between the inhabitants of the city and what is expressed in its walls.

movies.title: House of Secrets: The Burari Deaths
movies.Plot: Suicide, murder or something else? This docuseries examines chilling truths and theories around the deaths of 11 members of a Delhi family.

movies.title: The Hunt for Veerappan
movies.Plot: A poacher who conquered the jungles of South India and became the subject of the biggest manhunt of India.

movies.title: Vatican Girl: The Disappearance of Emanuela Orlandi
movies.Plot: A 15 year-old girl living in Vatican City, disappeared under mysterious circumstances that are believed to have involved the Vatican.

movies.title: The Indrani Mukerjea Story: Buried Truth
movies.Plot: With new revelations and access, this docuseries investigates the disappearance of 25-year-old Sheena Bora. It reveals the shocking aftermath.

movies.title: Nail Bomber: Manhunt
movies.Plot: This documentary tells the story of the 1999 London bombings that targeted minority communities, and the race to find the far-right extremist behind them.

movies.title: Meltdown: Three Mile Island
movies.Plot: Insiders recount the events, controversies and lingering effects of the accident at the Three Mile Island nuclear power plant in Pennsylvania.

movies.title: The Anthrax Attacks
movies.Plot: Days after 9/11, letters containing fatal anthrax spores spark panic and tragedy in the US. This documentary follows the subsequent FBI investigation.

movies.title: The Mystery of Marilyn Monroe: The Unheard Tapes
movies.Plot: Explores the mystery surrounding the death of movie icon Marilyn Monroe through previously unheard interviews with her inner circle.

movies.title: Camp Confidential: America's Secret Nazis
movies.Plot: At the height of WWII, a group of young Jewish refugees are sent to a secret POW camp near Washington, D.C. The recent refugees soon discover that the prisoners are no other than Hitler's top scientists.

movies.title: Queen Cleopatra
movies.Plot: Netflix docudrama about Queen Cleopatra of Egypt of the Ptolemaic lineage from Macedonia, Greece, that ruled for 21 years, between the years 51 BC and 30 BC, ending with her suicide.

movies.title: Making Malinche: A Documentary by Nacho Cano
movies.Plot: Join the creative process behind Nacho Cano's new musical based on the love story of Malinche and Hernan Cortes and the merging of their two worlds.

movies.title: Bank Robbers: The Last Great Heist
movies.Plot: Through revealing interviews, the perpetrators of Argentina's most famous bank robbery detail how, and why, they carried out the spectacular 2006 operation.

movies.title: Indian Predator: The Butcher of Delhi
movies.Plot: Uncovering the details of gruesome killings, people who were at the epicentre talk about what went down.

movies.title: World War II: From the Frontlines
movies.Plot: Through vividly enhanced archival footage and voices from all sides of the conflict, this docuseries brings WWII to life like never before.

movies.title: Emicida: AmarElo - It’s All For Yesterday
movies.Plot: Between scenes from his concert in São Paulo's Theatro Municipal, rapper and activist Emicida celebrates the rich legacy of Black Brazilian culture.

movies.title: Alexander: The Making of a God
movies.Plot: Alexander was King of the ancient Greek city state Macedon and widely considered to be one of history's greatest and most successful military commanders. By the age of 30 he had created one of the largest empires in history.

movies.title: Eldorado: Everything the Nazis Hate
movies.Plot: A glittery nightclub in 1920s Berlin becomes a haven for the queer community in this documentary exploring the freedoms lost amid Hitler's rise to power.

movies.title: Testament: The Story of Moses
movies.Plot: Explore the life of Moses, his journey from outcast and murderer to prophet and liberator of the Hebrews from Egyptian oppression.

movies.title: The Real Bling Ring: Hollywood Heist
movies.Plot: Based on the "Bling Ring" robberies that took place in LA rich suburbs between 2008-2009. Three-part documentary with access to the gang that perpetuated the heist.

movies.title: D.B. Cooper: Where Are You?!
movies.Plot: It follows the 50-year quest to find Cooper, the man who hijacked a Northwest Airlines passenger jet in November 1971 and escaped with $200,000.

movies.title: Waco: American Apocalypse
movies.Plot: It showcases what happened in 1993 in Waco, Texas when cult leader David Koresh faced off against the federal government in a 51-day siege.

movies.title: Aftershock: Everest and the Nepal Earthquake
movies.Plot: Survivors' firsthand accounts and actual footage fuel this emotional docuseries about the deadly 2015 earthquake that shook Nepal.

movies.title: What Would Sophia Loren Do?
movies.Plot: An Italian-American grandmother and film buff finds strength and joy in the life of her screen idol, Sophia Loren.

movies.title: Five Came Back: The Reference Films
The Volcano: Rescue from Whakaari
movies.Plot: Portrays human bravery and resilience after a tragic volcano disaster in New Zealand.

movies.title: Rita Moreno: Just a Girl Who Decided to Go for It
movies.Plot: A look at the life and work of Rita Moreno from her humble beginnings in Puerto Rico to her success on Broadway and in Hollywood.

movies.title: Mysteries of the Faith
movies.Plot: The series explores the secrets of Christianity's most legendary treasures. From the Crown of Thorns to the iconic Holy Grail, these cherished relics have inspired millions for centuries.

movies.title: Terim
movies.Plot: Legendary manager Fatih Terim recounts his football journey, from his playing days to coaching and leading several teams to championship glory.

movies.title: Apollo 13: Survival
movies.Plot: In April 1970, NASA faced the greatest crisis in its history; three astronauts halfway to the moon on a spacecraft that had suffered a catastrophic explosion.

movies.title: Gladbeck: The Hostage Crisis
movies.Plot: In August 1988, two armed bank robbers keep German and Dutch police at bay for 54 hours during a hostage-taking drama that ends badly.

movies.title: Pepsi, Where's My Jet?
movies.Plot: When a 20-year-old attempts to win a fighter jet in a Pepsi sweepstakes, he sets the stage for a David versus Goliath court battle for the history books.

movies.title: The Redeem Team
movies.Plot: Follows the story of the 2008 U.S. Olympic Men's Basketball team and how "The Redeem Team" set a new standard for American basketball.

movies.title: Mysteries of the Terracotta Warriors
movies.Plot: Fifty years after the Terracotta Warriors' discovery, this documentary unearths new secrets from China's first emperor's mausoleum and its 8,000 pottery soldier guards.

movies.title: Return of the King: The Fall and Rise of Elvis Presley
movies.Plot: He had one chance to show the world he was still the King of Rock 'n' Roll. Discover the story behind Elvis Presley's triumphant '68 comeback special.

movies.title: Spy Ops
movies.Plot: Intelligence operatives from MI6 to the CIA share insider stories of spy craft, Cold War campaigns, and coups carried out by covert agents.

movies.title: Einstein and the Bomb
movies.Plot: What happened after Einstein fled Nazi Germany? Using archival footage and his own words, this docudrama dives into the mind of a tortured genius.

movies.title: The Martha Mitchell Effect
movies.Plot: The Cabinet wife who spoke out during Watergate and the Nixon administration's campaign to gaslight her into silence.

movies.title: WWII in Color: Road to Victory
movies.Plot: Gripping historical footage and expert commentary give detailed insights into the leading figures and decisive turning points of WWII.

movies.title: Blood, Sex & Royalty
movies.Plot: A modern take on the British royal drama, offering a window into the lives of history's deadliest, sexiest and most iconic monarchs.

movies.title: Making The Billion Dollar Code
movies.Plot: N/A

movies.title: Secrets of the Neanderthals
movies.Plot: A unique excavation unravels the complex and creative nature of Neanderthals, shattering preconceptions through the lens of a landmark discovery - the best-preserved Neanderthal skeleton found in over 25 years.

movies.title: Hitler and the Nazis: Evil on Trial
movies.Plot: Chronicles Hitler's ascent to power, his regime's use of propaganda, censorship, and anti-Semitic policies, as well as the eventual downfall of the Nazi leadership.

movies.title: Curry & Cyanide - The Jolly Joseph Case
movies.Plot: The real life case of Jolly Joseph, a lady suspected of planning the cyanide poisoning of six family members over more than ten years, including a two-year-old kid.

movies.title: 11M: Terror in Madrid
movies.Plot: The story of the worst terrorist attack in European history. Survivors and insiders recount March 11, 2004's terrorist attack on Madrid, including the political crisis it ignited and the hunt for the perpetrators.

movies.title: Wyatt Earp and The Cowboy War
movies.Plot: The legendary feud between Wyatt Earp and Ike Clanton unfolds through vivid reenactments in this gritty docudrama about the gunfight that defined an era.

movies.title: American Manhunt: The Boston Marathon Bombing
movies.Plot: Follows the tragedy in which terrorists detonated a bomb at the Boston Marathon's finish line; they carried out the attack by placing two homemade pressure-cooker bombs that resulted in three fatalities and numerous injuries.

movies.title: Temple of Film: 100 Years of the Egyptian Theatre
movies.Plot: Guillermo del Toro, Rian Johnson and other film luminaries look back at LA's historic Egyptian Theatre as it returns to its former movie palace glory.

movies.title: Who Killed Jill Dando?
movies.Plot: Revisit the shocking 1999 murder of beloved TV presenter Jill Dando, which continues to mystify experts and the public, in this in-depth documentary.

movies.title: Churchill at War
movies.Plot: Churchill's pivotal leadership role during WWII, his wartime strategy, and the life events that shaped him as a paramount figure of the era, told through his own words.

movies.title: Attack on Pearl Harbor: Minute by Minute
movies.Plot: Ahead of the 80th Anniversary of the deadly Japanese aerial attack on Pearl Harbor, this documentary provides a detailed account of events - from planning to the aftermath.

movies.title: Indian Predator: The Diary of a Serial Killer
movies.Plot: When a suspect is found in a journalist's murder, the case is considered closed until a secret diary suggests 13 more victims and possible cannibalism.

movies.title: Indian Predator: Murder in a Courtroom
movies.Plot: In 2004, a brutal predator was lynched in a courtroom. This is the story of the community he terrorized - and the vengeance they unleashed.

movies.title: Beast of Bangalore: Indian Predator
movies.Plot: A dangerous predator on the streets of Bangalore, lurking in the shadows leaving women feeling unsafe. He changed the whole landscape of this city.

movies.title: Turning Point: The Bomb and the Cold War
movies.Plot: The series chronicles the creation of the atomic bomb and the spread of nuclear arms over the following decades. It continues past the dissolution of the Soviet Union to Vladimir Putin's ascent and the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

movies.title: Cyberbunker: The Criminal Underworld
movies.Plot: A group of hackers powered the darkest corners of the internet from a Cold War-era bunker in a quiet German tourist town.

movies.title: African Queens: Njinga
movies.Plot: Expert interviews and other documentary content with premium scripted docudrama about different queens.

movies.title: Katrina: Come Hell and High Water
movies.Plot: The revisit of the hurricane that caused 1,392 fatalities and more than $100 billion in damages in 2005.

movies.title: Grenfell: Uncovered
movies.Plot: Reveals decisions by officials and companies before the 2017 Grenfell Tower fire that made it preventable. Survivors, families, and firefighters share their accounts of the tragedy that took 72 lives.

movies.title: Britain and The Blitz
movies.Plot: This approach brings history to life through vividly restored archival footage and firsthand accounts of WWII Britain during the Blitz.

movies.title: ARA San Juan: The Submarine that Disappeared
movies.Plot: Interviews with experts and relatives fuel this investigative docuseries about the tragic 2017 disappearance of a military submarine that shook the world.

movies.title: Attack on London: Hunting The 7/7 Bombers
movies.Plot: N/A

movies.title: The Twister: Caught in the Storm
movies.Plot: It is graduation day in Joplin, Missouri. As the Class of 2011 collect their diplomas, their hometown is hit by a rare EF-5 tornado. Believing it could be the end of the world, a group of teenagers find themselves in the eye of th...

movies.title: Black Barbie
movies.Plot: In a poetic animation, Comfort Arthur recollects her personal journey with skin bleaching products and questions societal ideals of beauty.

movies.title: Surviving Black Hawk Down
movies.Plot: Documents the real 1993 Battle of Mogadishu through firsthand accounts from U.S. soldiers and Somali civilians, detailing the mission to capture warlord Aidid and the downing of two helicopters.

movies.title: Turning Point: The Vietnam War
movies.Plot: The Vietnam War's profound effects on American identity, causing social division and eroding government trust. More than military defeat, it transformed US politics and culture.

movies.title: The Truth About Jussie Smollett?
movies.Plot: Features Smollett interview plus talks with police, lawyers and investigators claiming new case evidence. Viewers can judge who's telling the truth about the Jussie Smollett case.

movies.title: Turn of the Tide: The Surreal Story of Rabo de Peixe
UnBroken
movies.Plot: Guided by an ancestral spirit, a young Ghanaian girl transforms pain into power as she overcomes trauma and embraces her destiny in a journey of resilience, healing, and cultural empowerment.

movies.title: Julia's Stepping Stones
movies.Plot: Julia Reichert, who passed away after a long battle with cancer in 2022, recounts the path she took to becoming an acclaimed filmmaker: her upbringing and education, and her interest in working people and the women's movement.

movies.title: Becoming Led Zeppelin
movies.Plot: The film traces the journeys of the four members of the Stairway To Heaven rockers through the music scene of the 1960s and their meeting in the summer of 1968, culminating in 1970.

movies.title: Sunday Best: The Untold Story of Ed Sullivan
movies.Plot: Examines the groundbreaking career of pioneering television host Ed Sullivan, focusing on his platforming of Black musicians during the civil rights era.

movies.title: The Stringer: The Man Who Took The Photo
movies.Plot: A two-year investigation uncovers a scandal behind the making of one of the most-recognized photographs of the 20th century. Five decades of secrets are unraveled in the search for justice for a man known only as "the stringer."

movies.title: Titans: The Rise of Wall Street
movies.Plot: Money made America a global empire and for the last 150 years America's riches have been controlled by the titans of Wall Street.

movies.title: Cover-Up
movies.Plot: Seymour Hersh has been at the front lines of political journalism in the United States. Hersh's breakthrough reportage has brought to the public's attention many of the most damning constitutional wrongdoings and cover-ups.
